DOC.brief_summary: Investigation safety tolerability BI 1034020 healthy male volunteer follow intravenous ( IV ) infusion subcutaneous ( SC ) injection single dose exploration pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics BI 1034020 single dose determination bioavailability subcutaneous injection BI 1034020
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Study Single Escalating Doses BI 1034020 Administered Intravenously Subcutaneously Male Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male base upon complete medical history , include physical examination , vital sign ( blood pressure , pulse rate ) , 12lead electrocardiogram , clinical laboratory test 2 . Age within range 18 40 year 3 . Body mass index within range 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 4 . Signed date write informed consent prior admission study accordance GCP local legislation . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate electrocardiogram ) deviate normal judge clinically relevant investigator . Pulse rate outside range 5090 bpm blood pressure outside range 90140 systolic 5090 mmHg diastolic blood pressure confirm repeat measurement 2 . Any evidence clinically relevant concomitant disease . 3 . Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder . 4 . Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) . 5 . Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder . 6 . History relevant orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackout . 7 . Chronic relevant acute infection .
